message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000.  It's a great deal considering its value to you. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Bob, I appreciate your interest. $9,000 is a good starting point, but I'm looking for something a little closer to $10,000 to make this work for me.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $9,500?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $9,000. Is there any flexibility on your end?
Bob, I understand your position. While I'm not willing to go as low as $9,000, I'm flexible.  Let's split the difference. How about $9,250? This would allow us both to get a good deal.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. How about we meet in the middle at $9,125?
